WorkItem.Description:
If you try to run fresh new vanilla build of new MVCMusicStore v2.0 in Firefox 3+, the contents part doesn't ever shows up. While looking at the issue, it seems problem in CSS.

Quick workaround will be removing/commenting-out the "overflow:hidden" property from #main style in Site.css. While doing this, it mess up home page a little. But people can get the idea.
WorkItem.Summary: MVCMusicStore v2.0 doesn't show up contents part in Firefox

Comments.Message:
The same happens to me. The workaround helps a little. Thks!
I hope this can be solved soon.
Will get this in next release
